data.title: Robert Bender
data.text:
Born on February 25, 1957, passed on March 16, 2011. Devoted son to the late George and Doris (Mertz) Bender. Loving brother of Mary (Eric) Appel, Teresa (Barry), Ron (Kelly), Tony (Sue). Caring uncle to Barry W., and Joshua Yoakum, Megan, Melissa, and Ryan Bender, and Caroline Appel. Cousin and friend to many, best friend of cousin Rand Sugar. Devoted NASCAR fan. He was an employee of Crown Manor apartments and a member of refrigeration service engineer society. He will be greatly missed.

Memorial will be held at Dellwood Lounge, Saturday April 2, 2011 from 5:30pm-9pm, 1427 Chambers Road, Dellwood, MO 63135. Ph #: 314-521-9489

A time to come together, a place that Robert enjoyed. Robert enjoyed his NASCAR, especially #24 ðŸ™‚ Always remember the good times!
